entry.title: Current Conditions: 6.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Victoria Harbour 12:00 AM PST Wednesday 11 January 2023
Temperature: 6.7°C
Pressure: 100.6 kPa
Humidity: 87 %
Dewpoint: 4.7°C
Wind: N 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind light except northeast 30 km/h near Juan de Fuca Strait. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 near Juan de Fuca Strait in the afternoon. High 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers. Temperature steady near 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Showers beginning in the evening. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southeast 50 gusting to 70 except gusting to 90 near Haro Strait overnight. Temperature steady near 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 10 January 2023
